name: Prakhar Maheshwari
college: Ajay Kumar Garg Engineering College, AKTU

education.school: Ajay Kumar Garg Engineering College, AKTU
Shri Gulab Rai Montessori Senior Secondary School

projects.name: E-learning platform
projects.description: A fully functional ed-tech platform enables users to create, consume, and rate educational content, fostering a collaborative and interactive learning environment with a 90% satisfaction rate, promoting engagement and knowledge sharing. Learners enjoy an immersive educational journey with interactive features tailored to enhance their experience. Our platform boasts an exceptional 95% knowledge retention rate.. A highly valuable ecosystem, with an unparalleled approval rating of 99%, empowering instructors to craft impactful learning experiences.

projects.name: Web Real-Time Communication
projects.description: WebRTC, a cutting-edge technology, utilizes powerful APIs for seamless real-time communication online. With over 1 billion monthly active users worldwide, alongside 99% efficient data sharing, directly between web browsers and compatible applications. Leveraging UDP, WebRTC ensures around 90% efficient data transmission, boosting video calling significantly. Renowned for exceptional video calling, its the preferred choice, with minimal risks in extensive data sharing, covering about 80% of its use cases.

projects.name: Monitoring Solution Stack
projects.description: Build a platform offering real-time insights, streamlined troubleshooting, and maintenance for optimizing system performance. With an uptime of 99.9% and an average issue resolution time of under 15 minutes, it aims for 90% effectiveness in addressing issues. Prometheus excels in agile metrics collection, monitoring, and alerting, providing real-time insights with approximately 95% accuracy. Implemented Lokis advanced log aggregation and querying capabilities cover around 90% of log use cases, enhancing root cause analysis and anomaly detection.

projects.name: Blackbox Crypthunt Portal
projects.description: Within Crypthunt, players navigate puzzles, demanding advanced problem-solving skills and research acumen for resolution. Impressively, players achieve success rates of up to 90%, demonstrating their mastery of the games complexities. The Blackbox Portal offers a focused experience on numerical input and output. Players decipher underlying expressions or formulas from integer sets with remarkable precision, achieving success rates of around 80%.

experiences.description: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot and resolve intricate issues, we achieved a remarkable 50% enhancement in system reliability. Leveraging cutting-edge technologies such as Node.js, AWS (Amazon Web Services), and PostgreSQL, in creation of a scalable and resilient backend architecture.

full_output.name: Prakhar Maheshwari
achievements_and_awards: I clinched 1st Prize at the prestigious National Level Technical Paper Presentation, Scrolls23, held by Ajay Kumar Garg Engineering College in collaboration with Ghaziabad Management Association. My winning presentation highlighted groundbreaking insights into the Intelligent Transport System, showcasing advancements with a remarkable precision and accuracy of 95%.
